Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Radium 223 dichloride is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Prostate cancer that is castrate resistant (has not responded to treatments that lower testosterone levels). It is used in patients whose cancer has metastasized (spread) to the bones and is causing symptoms but has not spread to other organs.

Section.Para: Radium 223 dichloride is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
